unnormalised: The transfer window looks exciting! East Bengal needs a strong midfielder like Anirudh Thapa to compete with Mohun Bagan. Chennaiyin FC also requires defensive reinforcements. Reminds me of "Chak De! India" - building a winning team requires strategic acquisitions. Hope ISL clubs spend wisely and avoid overpaying like R. 5 Cr for a player who isn't worth it. We need quality, not just quantity. Let’s see who makes the cut before the season starts on 1st October. Maybe even source talent from smaller I-League clubs.
normalised: The transfer window looks exciting! East Bengal needs a strong midfielder like Anirudh Thapa to compete with Mohun Bagan. Chennaiyin F C also requires defensive reinforcements. Reminds me of "Chak De! India" - building a winning team requires strategic acquisitions. Hope I S L clubs spend wisely and avoid overpaying like rupee five crore for a player who isn't worth it. We need quality, not just quantity. Let’s see who makes the cut before the season starts on first October. Maybe even source talent from smaller I-League clubs.
